definitions.definition: Often followed by against , between , for , or to : a ( deep ) feeling of dislike or repugnance , normally towards a person and less often towards a thing , often without any conscious reasoning ; aversion , distaste , hostility ; ( countable ) an instance of this.
Natural contrariety or incompatibility between things , as a result of which they negatively affect or oppose each other; ( countable ) an instance of this.
A person or thing that one has a (deep) feeling of dislike or repugnance towards; an anathema , a bête noire , a bugbear .
A person or thing that has a (deep) feeling of dislike or repugnance towards another person or thing; a hater .
The quality of being antipathetic : not easily united by grafting .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) Often followed by against , between , for , or to : a ( deep ) feeling of dislike or repugnance , normally towards a person and less often towards a thing , often without any conscious reasoning ; aversion , distaste , hostility ; ( countable ) an instance of this.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Natural contrariety or incompatibility between things , as a result of which they negatively affect or oppose each other; ( countable ) an instance of this.
( countable ) A person or thing that one has a (deep) feeling of dislike or repugnance towards; an anathema , a bête noire , a bugbear .
( countable , obsolete ) A person or thing that has a (deep) feeling of dislike or repugnance towards another person or thing; a hater .
( botany ) The quality of being antipathetic : not easily united by grafting .
